events.message: Customer has reported an auto accident involving their sedan on Main Street, resulting in visible front-end damage.
The filed claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords found in the initial report.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to support the customer throughout the claims process.
Customer notified that the claim related to the vehicle collision has been received and is now under review.
Request sent to the customer asking for police report, vehicle photos, and medical bills related to the collision.
Customer has submitted all requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and repair estimate.
Investigation team has begun the review of submitted documents and vehicle damage following the reported auto accident.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision circumstances and extent of vehicle damage.
Proposed settlement offer communicated to the customer covering vehicle repairs and associated costs.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
Official approval granted for the claim with the settlement amount finalized and authorized for payment.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued to the customer to cover repairs and losses from the accident.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful settlement payment and customer confirmation.
Complete files and documentation of the vehicle accident claim archived for future reference and record keeping.
